Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 73rd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1956...
Injured on 4/10/1956 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/14/1958 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/26/1959, off Ernest Weems (MAN)...
Injured on 8/6/1962 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/13/1963 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 9/5/1963 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Ashburn in 1967...
Injured on 5/4/1973 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 8/23/1974...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/12/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $1,780,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/18/1980, off Marcos Chaidez (Mal)...
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 6/21/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $712,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/6/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $1,680,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 9/1/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $428,000 per year...
